thread.title: Atletico Madrid star Diego Godin in spitting storm after retaliating following provocation from opponent
thread.title_full: Atletico Madrid star Diego Godin in spitting storm after retaliating following provocation from opponent

author: Jack Rathborn
title: Atletico Madrid star Diego Godin in spitting storm after retaliating following provocation from opponent
text:
Atletico Madrid star Diego Godin in spitting storm after retaliating following provocation from opponent The Uruguayan centre-back spat back after Alaves forward Deyverson initiated the squabble between the pair Share Diego Godin is caught up in a spitting storm with Alaves' Deyverson (Photo: Twitter) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Atletico Madrid stalwart Diego Godin has been embroiled in a vile spitting incident after retaliating to Alaves forward Deyverson. 
The Brazilian appeared to initiate the spitting at full-time, landing his shot on the Uruguayan's chin. 
The wily Godin, known to defend in a physical manner, responded in an equally disgusting fashion though as Deyverson had his back turned. 
The feisty affair ended goalless with Godin's physical defending angering Deyverson throughout the game. (Photo: Twitter) (Photo: Twitter) 
Tensions boiled over at half-time when the Brazilian ripped off his shirt and offered it to his opponent. 
Godin was even fortunate to not be sent off during the game when he caught Deyverson in the face with a stray arm. 
Diego Simeone's side have fallen off the pace in La Liga and this latest setback sees them seven points off leaders Real Madrid having played two games more. 
The Copa Del Rey semi-final against Barcelona is next up on February 1 with El Cholo now bracing himself for a hefty ban for his captain. poll loading Will Atletico Madrid win the Copa del Rey? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
